trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around October 9th 2008
Summary: Multiple white spheres of light appearing and dissapearing over NORAD
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsAn ex-girlfriend and I wanted to talk, so we drove to a part of Colorado Springs off Bijou where you have a clear view of Cheyenne Mountain and most of the city. We sat on the car hood and Cheyenne mountain was straight ahead. I saw them first, about 7 very bright glowing spheres of light would appear, swiftly move sideways for about 4 seconds, then they all disappeared one by one. She was on the phone at the time and didn't see it, when I told her she asked if I had been smoking crack. I told her to watch Cheyenne mountain, and sure enough, about 5 minutes later the lights showed up again, this time farther above NORAD. They would be "on" for a few seconds, then disappear. the only thing I could think of was that they were some kind of flare on parachutes, but because of their movement and behavior there's no way that's possible. I was in such awe while seeing the second ones, I completely spaced the idea of taking a picture of them. After all the second ones were gone i thought of it and got my camera phone ready, and we stayed there about an hour more, but didn't see anything else.
